website_summaries.verdict: Despite some reports of quality issues, most customers found this glove to offer both durability and a rugged yet comfortable feel.
pros: Soft leather is flexible and offers a wide range of motion
cons: Some buyers report quality issues after a few rounds with holes forming in the fabric and ripping along the seams

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this synthetic glove as I recently developed a skin sensitivity to leather gloves. The m/l glove I purchased is a little snug, but seems to have loosened just a bit over the round. There’s a lot of humidity in Florida, and yesterday’s heat index was at 100 degrees. The glove did great, I didn’t have to rotate gloves at all, which I was expecting to need to do. I will purchase again, only a large next time.
customer_reviews.author: DVA

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these gloves for almost two years. I don't even bother trying other gloves because I/m always disappointed compared to this Nike. It's the longest lasting glove I've ever played with, and I wear it from 1st tee to 18th hole-in. It gets stinky after three or four rounds, but throw it in the washer and it's ready to go again. I get at least 10, maybe 15 rounds before the palm pad wears out or splits, which is what usually fails for me on other brands after three or four rounds. I just hope the supply doesn't run out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high quality synthetic glove
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glove and I noticed tiger is wearing the exact glove at the PGA championships. I have a mediums hand and the mediums fit tight which is excellent because they all stretch after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Milo Tindle

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I live in Florida and the leather ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like it. I live in Florida and the leather gloves quickly deteriorate. I bought a similar hybrid Nike golf glove that worked great. On this older version the entire palm was leather and it lasted a entire year. I am hoping this one does too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great value glove
customer_reviews.text: I had this glove for over 1 year, but maybe only about 7 months worth of golf before it finally ripped. The only wear on the glove was below the pinky, I normally see wear towards the bottom right palm of my left hand but this glove had an additional layer of leather that proved helpful. For the price, I thought I got great value out of this glove. I tend to like to try different things so I’m not going to buy it again right now as I want to try out some more premium leather gloves but I definitely don’t regret purchasing this glove.
customer_reviews.author: Gino Bautista

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The glove arrived quickly and as expected from Nike in terms of quality. Able to find the size needed so purchased two. I highly recommend this product, company and will purchase other items in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MFJ2170

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I've used this glove for two rounds so far and am pleased with my purchase. It fits to my normal glove size and I like the flexibility of the material on the knuckles. Time will tell how long it lasts but as of now I'm pleased with this glove at a value price.
customer_reviews.author: bgries7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my brother in law and he loves it ! perfect fit , comfortable and stylish !
customer_reviews.author: ashley covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: Soft feel. Will keep playing with this glove as long as I can find it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Laudenslager

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as I'd like, but great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Glove is nowhere near as soft as the more expensive gloves from some other brands, but the dollar to quality ratio on this glove is hard to beat. It sucks to pay $30+ a few times a season just on gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Scales

customer_reviews.title: Cadet Golf Glove
customer_reviews.text: The cadet sized golf glove fits me perfect and looks good as well
customer_reviews.author: Alan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good glove for price
customer_reviews.text: Good glove for the price, I have a couple of these and rotate every 9
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last too long
customer_reviews.text: Since Nike took over making this glove, it is lasting for far less games than it did before. The palm and thumb began to show signs or rubbing through after just three rounds!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K

customer_reviews.title: Great golf glove
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and durable glove. Ihsve been using them for the last 2 years
customer_reviews.author: glen h. estell

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a golfer
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for med-large size. I bought as a Christmas gift and my son in law really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Well vented but moves around on your hand after wearing for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Grip/rip it!
customer_reviews.text: This glove is plush & ready to go. It replaced my old Nike glove & I'm ready to order another one. True to size! I have big hands & the XL fits tailor made.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando W

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: I probably go golfing about 15 times a year and to the range 25 time in the same time span. The glove tends to break down after two years at that rate and will need replacing. For the price, it's a good glove that looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Vu

customer_reviews.title: Really like the glove overall
customer_reviews.text: Really like the glove overall, my only complaint is the lack of durability of the pad that is located to fit over the fatty part of the palm below the pinky and just above the wrist. That pad wears out too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Golf Glove
customer_reviews.text: Really nice glove. It is holding up well in the desert heat. Glove has good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The club shifts in my hand when I'm wearing these ...
customer_reviews.text: The club shifts in my hand when I'm wearing these gloves. It doesn't with my gloves from Footjoy and Callaway.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Fit is snug
customer_reviews.text: This glove last me a long time and has palm pad that other gloves do not and always wore a hole through em.
customer_reviews.author: Miller Time 009

customer_reviews.title: Ripped but I would probably give it a 5 if it wasn’t
customer_reviews.text: Small rip inside finger. Still using it as I needed it urgently for a tournament but annoying. Other than that it fits nice.
customer_reviews.author: JackaryBinx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels great! Gotta love a fresh glove. Time will tell how long it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look, the fit is great, and the feel is pretty cool for a black glove. Most black gloves make a sweat like a pig, but these felt cool and decently dry.
customer_reviews.author: usaDiabeticTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected from Nike!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft leather and super durable! Can’t expect anything more for such a great price. Great golf glove
customer_reviews.author: Not Walt Whitman

customer_reviews.title: A fine glove for the money.
customer_reviews.text: A fine glove for the money, they last me a whole season playing once a week, no prob.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value for a golf glove
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go-to glove. Best gloves for the money. Comfortable, light, and won’t make your hand sweat like a full leather glove.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Right and Lasts
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic, and fits great. Delivery was quick and packaging was perfect! We will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: The glove looks okay. It doesn’t fit well and thus isn’t comfortable. I will not purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feel and fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this glove . The grip is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: True to Size
customer_reviews.text: The glove fits true to size and feels great. This review is written after using the glove only once on 18 holes. I will update review if things change.
customer_reviews.author: MSB007

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these gloves and do like them but they have a revised new version that doesn’t have the extra palm pad and I feel the glove will not last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Howard s levy

customer_reviews.title: Nike products seem to run smaller
customer_reviews.text: Good glove but as Nike product seem to do ...sizes run a bit smaller. Glove still fits but very snug. It's difficult to find Black gloves but I think I will try any Nike product on at a store before I order from any online service.
customer_reviews.author: knock2x

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Love their other stuff but this fell apart after five outings
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: Fits and feels like any old average golf glove; nothing special. I do not know about wear and tear as I switched back to Bionic. I will probably use this for hitting at home in my net.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W

customer_reviews.title: will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great feel. Probably a good idea to buy the next size up unless you like a snug fit. Although snug, it is not stiff and still easy to move hand freely.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glove for my dad. He uses it all the time and he loves it. The glove breathes and gives him a good grip. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brett S. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great glove.  No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glove. Fit is perfect and they have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Mark Wingard

customer_reviews.title: Check this out
customer_reviews.text: This glove is worth the money. Soft leather and durable. Correct in the size.
customer_reviews.author: Deercreek79

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great grip. The price makes this a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Leon F. Washington

customer_reviews.title: To protect the hand that swings.
customer_reviews.text: Its cool, fit is great, I like the all black, but regardless of the fact that it makes me look cool, I don't play better with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cariveau

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This glove fit well and provided a good grip on the course
customer_reviews.author: Caleb E

customer_reviews.title: Fits just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend as a gift, and he absolutely loves it. He golfs once a week, and hasn't had any complaints about the glove.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Fits  very well
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort of the glove and fits my hand very well
customer_reviews.author: jackakron

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: Great glove!! Used all season and I golf at least once a week and I'll be able to use for next year also
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Good Glove
customer_reviews.text: Gloves run a little small so if you think you are a medium buy the large. Other than that it is a very comfortable clove that allows for good circulation and air movement.
customer_reviews.author: David Niderost

customer_reviews.title: great glove
customer_reviews.text: i like the nike dura feel, it lasts a pretty decent amount of rounds before the wear finally starts to show
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift; recipient was very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. I was leery ordering online but it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Unapproved substitution.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because the one I had lasted well. It had an extra wear pad on the hand heel. They sent a substitution that does not include this extra wear pad. This is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Pettit

customer_reviews.title: game changer
customer_reviews.text: Best glove I have worn. It is still flexible and soft. It wears well
customer_reviews.author: Duke the golfer

customer_reviews.title: Great glove.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and long lasting. I have used a few of these gloves and they last for a long time. They also do well when my hand is sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: the glove itself is awesome, comfortable and good quality but the only reason ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have the average hand size, I would suggest you go with large, the glove itself is awesome, comfortable and good quality but the only reason i'm not giving it 5 stars is because I ordered medium and the size was not as I expected it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing seems a bit off
customer_reviews.text: Really fits like a small not a medium. So be careful when you order.
customer_reviews.author: Wisdom Lover

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this June 18, 2018 and I've golfed about 3-4 times since then and it's already started to rip on the palm. I love how it fits but very disappointed with choice of material.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: The Glooooove
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, I have a large hand and XXL is perfect. Name brand so it’s a decent price
customer_reviews.author: Allen R.

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for the money, does run a bit small that is what you want in a golf glove, to accommodate stretching over time.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Gooding

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! So light and breathable
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift! He loved it! So light and breathable!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this glove for my son and he likes it a lot! Now to go play some Golf!
customer_reviews.author: LINDY

customer_reviews.title: Golf glove
customer_reviews.text: I've used this glove probably 10 rounds of 18 and so far and it's still in pretty good shape
customer_reviews.author: Paul DiBattiste

customer_reviews.title: Comfy works fine
customer_reviews.text: A little small for my hand but still works fine
customer_reviews.author: Silas

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Grip.
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. Started playing golf with this glove. Switched to a foot joy glove because my Nike glove wore out and Let’s just say i had to order one of these baby’s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Like a Glove Folks
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, I ordered down like most folks on here suggested. Have been using for about one month so far and it is holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Barth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but rip easily
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit well but do not wear well. After 3 rounds of golf the area on the hand where the fingers meet the palm began ripping. If buying, better buy a box if you play frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable glove!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable glove! I usually take a medium size glove but after reading some of the reviews I decided to get a medium large and I'm glad I did! The medium size would of been very tight!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiiboy58

customer_reviews.title: Great service.
customer_reviews.text: Good glove. A little expensive but the convenience made it worth it. Great delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: David Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Boycott Nike
customer_reviews.text: I guess it can’t be returned because of what the logo represents? No worries, I turned the swoosh into the Infinity logo.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Markus

customer_reviews.title: Very durable glove
customer_reviews.text: Played and hit many balls on the range, more than most people would, and no signs of wear, Fit is really good. I'll buy more of these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Greg T.

customer_reviews.title: I was definitely sent a fake
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this glove, and what was shipped to me is clearly a fake product. The one I received is obviously rubber, not leather as a genuine Nike Dura Feel should have.
customer_reviews.author: JJSegg

customer_reviews.title: Grip and Feel
customer_reviews.text: Just the best glove I’ve used. Soft and durable. I have hand washed it 3 times and it’s still offers a great feel. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the glove, fits great and it was a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Good glove for the price, other glove's I've tried leak glue on your palm when it gets hot so I'll stick with these.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove
customer_reviews.text: The glove looks good and feels good! My bf loves it
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dura Feel are my favorite gloves. I have a wide hand with beefy fingers and these fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ACFTFXR

customer_reviews.title: Make it a two pack
customer_reviews.text: Just like the saying goes. FITS LIKE A GLOVE. Would make it a two pack.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and comfortable. Feels like very good quality. Seems to run a bit small in size, but it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Zeager

customer_reviews.title: Great glove - great price
customer_reviews.text: This glove fits great and works well. I am 5'7 with average hands. I always get medium-large.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality velcro
customer_reviews.text: I love this glove - how it looks and feels - but the velcro is quickly starting to lose its stick.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Langner

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now.
customer_reviews.text: 50 years of golf and this may be the best glove ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, looks and feels genuine
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of white and tried different color. Good fit, looks and feels genuine..
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: This glove is very durable and fits me perfectly. I'm sorry that Nike has gone out of the golf equipment business.
customer_reviews.author: Caye

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: The glove is very comfortable but after using it for about a month, it is already wearing through.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove fits great...... however, it didn’t make it past 5 rounds.... wish they were a bit more durable.....
customer_reviews.author: Rob D.

customer_reviews.title: Glove arrived as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Glove arrived as advertised, hard to find comfortable durable gloves for my big hands.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kundinger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it! It keeps his hand gripped on his clubs and helps prevent blistering and callousing.
customer_reviews.author: JoslinTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: am a douche bag 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My buddy's said if you play with a black glove your a douche bag, am a douche bag 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Used a whole year so far with minimal wear showing
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best glove I've used yet. Durable, comfortable and longer lasting than most gloves I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Used twice at the driving range and one round of golf. My other two foot joy gloves have lasted ten years.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My first one was very comfortable and lasted about 50 rounds of 18, so I got another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great golf glove
customer_reviews.text: Great golf glove. Great fit. Runs a little small in comparison to other sizes, but gives you a good feel for the club.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Jraitiny

customer_reviews.title: Too much synthetic material results in hot hand during summer ...
customer_reviews.text: Too much synthetic material results in hot hand during summer. Prefer the old, all leather glove now out of production.
customer_reviews.author: L Graeme Bell

customer_reviews.title: Too small for large men.
customer_reviews.text: 6’6 225lbs didn’t cover my entire hand. Might bust out if one if I make a firm fist.
customer_reviews.author: nicole ivey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the black gloves. Protects my thumbs as I tend to grip my clubs a little tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Ry Tehomes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my hubby and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Lim

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, good feel
customer_reviews.text: Adjusted my size due to the reviews. Fits great, good feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: My personal favorite glove. Fits great and holds up much longer than other gloves I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Not a summer glove
customer_reviews.text: The glove did not work for me. The material did not absorb the perspiration and my hand slid inside the glove. On a positive note, the glove looks great.
customer_reviews.author: HWL

customer_reviews.title: Great glove. Feels good with with clubs
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. Feels good with with clubs. It is a bit on the thin side but overall looks great. Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Shields

product_meta.title: Nike Dura Feel VIII Men's Golf Glove
product_meta.description: The Nike Dura Feel VIII Golf Glove is made with premium goatskin leather on the palm and thumb for a secure, textured grip through 18 holes. Strategically placed stretch fabric gives you flexibility and airflow where you need it most.
feature_bullets: Genuine leather on palm and thumb
Perforated synthetic leather panel on back of hand
Strategically placed stretch fabric in fingers and back of hand
Angled tab design for a superior ergonomic fit
Customized fitting system for all hand shape and sizes
